bluesky 0.0.1
  • Reference

Extractive Industries Transparency Initiative (EITI)

Source: R/data-eitim.R
eitim_licenses_sf.Rd

Data made available by the Extractive Industries Transparency Initiative' Mongolia site.

eitim_licenses_sf

eitim_companies_df

Format

An object of class sf (inherits from tbl_df, tbl, data.frame) with 3447 rows and 14 columns.

Source

EITIM E-Reporting System

Examples
